content.text: Match ends, Manchester City 2, Napoli 1.
Second Half ends, Manchester City 2, Napoli 1.
Leroy Sané (Manchester City) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Christian Maggio (Napoli).
Foul by Christian Maggio (Napoli).
Ilkay Gündogan (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt saved. Ilkay Gündogan (Manchester City) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
Substitution, Manchester City. Danilo replaces Gabriel Jesus.
Gabriel Jesus (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Raúl Albiol (Napoli).
Corner,  Napoli. Conceded by Nicolás Otamendi.
Attempt saved. Leroy Sané (Manchester City) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Kevin De Bruyne.
Attempt saved. Adam Ounas (Napoli) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Dries Mertens.
Corner,  Napoli. Conceded by Fabian Delph.
Foul by Fernandinho (Manchester City).
Allan (Napoli) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Dries Mertens (Napoli) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by José Callejón with a through ball following a fast break.
Attempt saved. Kevin De Bruyne (Manchester City) right footed shot from a difficult angle and long range on the left is saved in the top left corner.
Christian Maggio (Napoli) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Leroy Sané (Manchester City) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Christian Maggio (Napoli).
Substitution, Napoli. Adam Ounas replaces Marek Hamsik.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Raúl Albiol.
Substitution, Manchester City. Ilkay Gündogan replaces David Silva.
Offside, Manchester City. Kevin De Bruyne tries a through ball, but Gabriel Jesus is caught offside.
Raúl Albiol (Napoli) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Goal!  Manchester City 2, Napoli 1. Amadou Diawara (Napoli) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom right corner.
Fernandinho (Manchester City) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Penalty conceded by Fernandinho (Manchester City) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty Napoli. Faouzi Ghoulam draws a foul in the penalty area.
Substitution, Napoli. Christian Maggio replaces Elseid Hysaj because of an injury.
Substitution, Manchester City. Bernardo Silva replaces Raheem Sterling.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match David Silva (Manchester City) because of an injury.
Delay in match Elseid Hysaj (Napoli) because of an injury.
Foul by David Silva (Manchester City).
Elseid Hysaj (Napoli) wins a free kick on the right wing.

Kyle Walker (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Elseid Hysaj (Napoli).
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Amadou Diawara.

Offside, Manchester City. Kevin De Bruyne tries a through ball, but Raheem Sterling is caught offside.

Foul by Fernandinho (Manchester City).
Faouzi Ghoulam (Napoli) wins a free kick on the left wing.

Second Half begins Manchester City 2, Napoli 0.
First Half ends, Manchester City 2, Napoli 0.
Attempt blocked. Lorenzo Insigne (Napoli) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Marek Hamsik.
